item.description:
Come out and join me for drinks and music on Sunday night!

You wouldn't know it from the outside that Rob Jack's is a cool, small pub located right on Main St. in Everett, just a few minutes north of Boston. You'll find a stage for live music, darts, great food, and a drink menu.

I've talked with Rob personally and he offered to make us just about anything we like and will put it on the menu just for us. He has cheeseburger plates, BBQ burgers, chilli burgers, jalapeno and cheese burgers, pizza burgers with cheese and marinara and all come with home made fries. Rob also has BBQ chicken sandwiches, chicken fingers with fries and wings and fries.

Rob Jack's is known for Martini's and you can make any Martini drink you like and Rob will put it on as a special for $5.

Music starts at 7PM. I will be performing at 7PM http://www.jodigriffi... & http://www.facebook.c...

Cover is $7 and there is plenty of street parking. There is bus service. The buses that run by are the 99, 105, 106, and the 110. Please feel free to e-mail me if you need directions by bus or even car at jodigriffith@aol.com.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be by the stage area
item.name: End the Weekend with Drinks & Music -Jodi Griffith
